abstract: The antitrust chief at the Federal Trade Commission is leaving after a 2-1/2 year period that saw the agency open a formal investigation into Intel and try to stop the merger of two organic grocery chains.
lead_paragraph: The antitrust chief at the Federal Trade Commission is leaving after a 2-1/2 year period that saw the agency open a formal investigation into Intel and try to stop the merger of two organic grocery chains.

headline.main: F.T.C. Antitrust Chief to Join Linklaters
